summary: Seraphim are heavenly beings that come from ancient Jewish beliefs. They are often shown as six-winged angels surrounding God's throne. In Christian and Jewish angel rankings, seraphim are among the highest. The Book of Isaiah describes them singing "holy, holy, holy" around God. This image has inspired art and literature, showing up in depictions of angels and heaven. Seraphim are also mentioned in other religious texts, like the Book of Enoch and the Book of Revelation.
title: Seraph
